metadata.name: Coop HUD *TEST*
metadata.description:
[h1]Coop HUD[/h1]
I've been tired of playing Isaac in coop with vanilla broken hud so I've created a new one. This mod is my try to render proper HUD for game like it should be from begging.
[h3] [b] MOD IS STILL DEVELOPED PLEASE SUBMIT ANY WEIR BEHAV [/b] [/h3]
[h2] *NEW* [/h2] [list] [*] Jacob and Essau FULL SUPPORT [*] Mod sprites refreshes on demand [/list] [h2] What this mod do[/h2] [list] [*] Renders proper HUD for single player [*] Renders proper HUD for coop/multiplayer [*] Shows pockets/pills/card names [*] Bethany charges/ colored charge bar [*] Vanilla like prompts (using cards/ pills/ active items ) [/list] [h2] Planned features [/h2] [*] Found HUD - render stats [list] [list] [b] Tainted characters [/b] [*] Pulsing Tainted Maggy hearts [*] Poop spells for Tainted ??? [*] Tainted Isaac collectibles [*] Tainted Cain - Bag of Crafting [/list] [*] Player colors [*] Extra HUD - render collectibles [/list] [h2] What this mod lack of[/h2] [list] [*] Boss bars – I won’t be messing with. I suggest using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2635267643] [Rep] Enhanced Boss Bars [/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge My mod should override Boss bars settings in case bar covers coopHUD check options. If boss bar covers items change it padding in settings. [*] Minimap – Same as boss bars – Use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635] MiniMAPI[/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge My mod should override MiniMAPI settings. Options should be: General -> Display on No HUD seed - On Map (1) - > Show map effect icons - Off [h2]Issues/ not working/missing[/h2] [list] [*] Urn of soul - only show open/close sprite state - no modding API function [*] Jar of Wisp - manual charge detection/ resets on restart- no modding API function [/list] [h2] Mods Compatibility[/h2] [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2635267643] [Rep] Enhanced Boss Bars [/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1978904635] MiniMAPI[/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872] [AB+|Rep] External item descriptions[/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2376005362] Encyclopedia - An In-Game Wiki[/url] from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/AgentCucco/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] AgentCucco [*] [/list] [h2] Thanks to![/h2] [list] [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge - for TBoI API and his mods which helped in developing this mod [*] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Wofsauge/myworkshopfiles/?appid=250900] Wofsauge - for TBoI API and his mods which helped in developing this mod [/list]
